{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$16.3M in 2021-2022** on contracts with HYPERTEC.

Across 730 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 45 have at least one amendment (6%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 133% and the average number of amendments was 1.33. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$10.5M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.35 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$144.2K. The longest contract was 4.78 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$5.7M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
